response.content:
{
  "step1": "Begin by preheating your oven to 350°F (175°C) while preparing a greased 9-inch round cake pan. Gather premium ingredients: cocoa powder, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, whole milk, vanilla extract, baking soda, and salt. These carefully measured items ensure a rich, moist chocolate cake for eight guests perfectly.",
  "step2": "Combine dry ingredients by sifting together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt in a large bowl. Meanwhile, cream unsalted butter with granulated sugar in another bowl until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla extract gradually to form a mixture. Then gently fold in the sifted dry blend.",
  "step3": "Pour the smooth batter into the prepared pan, ensuring an even spread across the bottom. Gently tap the pan on a countertop to eliminate air bubbles before placing it in the oven. Bake the cake for approximately 30-35 minutes until a toothpick inserted at the center comes out clean nicely.",
  "step4": "While the cake cools, prepare luscious chocolate frosting by melting dark chocolate and unsalted butter together. Stir in powdered sugar and heavy cream until smooth. Add a dash of vanilla extract and a pinch of salt, mixing thoroughly to achieve a silky texture perfect for topping the cake richly decorated.",
  "step5": "Once the cake has completely cooled, remove it from the pan and place it on a serving plate. Apply a generous layer of chocolate frosting on top, then spread evenly over the sides using a spatula. Decorate optionally with chocolate shavings or cocoa dust for an alluring, professional finish presentation.",
  "step6": "Allow the assembled cake to rest for at least fifteen minutes before slicing. This resting period lets the flavors meld beautifully within each moist layer and enhances the frosting’s smooth finish. Serve the delectable chocolate cake to eight delighted guests, accompanied by a refreshing glass of milk for pure satisfaction."
}
